name: unverifiable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to be proved to be true : Most of the stories about her life are unverifiable. He is notorious for making false or unverifiable claims about the success of his businesses. Opposite
verifiable
More examplesFewer examplesMuch of what we think we know about the universe is unverifiable.She made various unverifiable claims about the private lives of local officials.Most of the claims in the report are unsubstantiated and unverifiable.The newspaper explored the allegations about the president and found that they were unverifiable.
